name: Transformers
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 35 competition in about 20 hours.

Ludum Dare link.

Use your transforming tanks to destroy the enemy. They can transform into airplanes to quickly move over walls, but they can't shoot in this form (not implemented).

Destroy all enemy tanks to win.

The tanks attack automatically, your job is to keep moving, take cover and superior battle positions.

The game controls like a RTS, left click selects units, right click moves them. You can also hold SHIFT or draw a box to select multiple units.

Not implemented or not fully working:

  • More objetives (like capturing buildings).
  • Tank transformation (so it can fly and go over walls).
  • Decent pathfinding, and avoiding tanks to get one on top of another.
  • More graphics.
  • More enemies.
  • More powerups.
  • GUI, menus.
  • DLC.


Tools used:

  • Game Maker Studio.
  • Bfxr.
  • Bosca Ceoil.
